creator: Long Tech Network Limited
descriptionHtml:
ALL WORLDWIDE EMPIRES IN ONE SERVER

Real-Time Nation vs. Nation medieval strategy war game. Join now! Train your troops, gather your allies and go to war!

Rise of Empires is a Massive Multi-Player, Real-Time strategy war game. The player will take on the role of a leader in a small town devastated by the invasion of the Eastern Dynasty and the mysterious appearance of the legendary Death Harbingers who now have corrupted and had full control of the ancient powers of the dragons. Build your empire once again from the ruins, train your troops, tame dragons, recruit legendary heroes and join your allies in the non-ending war. To befriend or to plunder, the choice is yours!

FEATURES

-World Wide War
Real-time combat against players across the world, use your wisdom and strategy, lead your empire to greatness.

-Strategic Gameplay
One set of units just simply cannot dominate, Footmen, Cavalries, and Archers, you have to know your enemy and yourself to walk the battlefield of this world.

-Powerful Dragons
Powerful dragons each with different unique shouts are at your disposal, summon the dragons and crush your enemies with their help!

-Hero System
Whether you like to engage your enemies at a distance, take them on at close quarters, or you enjoy developing your base at home, there are TONS of heroes that can help you with just that!

-Alliance Warfare
No matter it’s going against different servers or fighting for the title of the king at home, your alliance will always be backing you up, as long as you find the right people of course.

-Realistic Graphics
Gorgeous medieval-style designs and arts. The Map, The World, Your Empire, The Units, The Heroes, Everything just seems REAL.

-Build Your Empire
Absolute Freedom in Empire Building, upgrade your facilities, research your technologies, train your troops and recruit powerful heroes to strengthen your empire!

Facebook Page:
https://www.facebook.com/RiseOfEmpireGame

NOTE: Rise of Empires is free to download and free to play, but does offer in-app purchases of items and other gifts. In-app purchases can be disabled through your device’s settings.
descriptionShort: It's the age of war. Build your own empire with strategy and conquer the world!

title: Rise of Empires: Ice and Fire

container.value:
RM C 21/F CENTRAL 88, 88 DES
VOEUX RD CENTRAL
HONG KONG

creator: Long Tech Network Limited
descriptionHtml:
ALL WORLDWIDE EMPIRES IN ONE SERVER

Real-Time Nation vs. Nation medieval strategy war game. Join now! Train your troops, gather your allies and go to war!

Rise of Empires is a Massive Multi-Player, Real-Time strategy war game. The player will take on the role of a leader in a small town devastated by the invasion of the Eastern Dynasty and the mysterious appearance of the legendary Death Harbingers who now have corrupted and had full control of the ancient powers of the dragons. Build your empire once again from the ruins, train your troops, tame dragons, recruit legendary heroes and join your allies in the non-ending war. To befriend or to plunder, the choice is yours!

FEATURES

-World Wide War
Real-time combat against players across the world, use your wisdom and strategy, lead your empire to greatness.

-Strategic Gameplay
One set of units just simply cannot dominate, Footmen, Cavalries, and Archers, you have to know your enemy and yourself to walk the battlefield of this world.

-Powerful Dragons
Powerful dragons each with different unique shouts are at your disposal, summon the dragons and crush your enemies with their help!

-Hero System
Whether you like to engage your enemies at a distance, take them on at close quarters, or you enjoy developing your base at home, there are TONS of heroes that can help you with just that!

-Alliance Warfare
No matter it’s going against different servers or fighting for the title of the king at home, your alliance will always be backing you up, as long as you find the right people of course.

-Realistic Graphics
Gorgeous medieval-style designs and arts. The Map, The World, Your Empire, The Units, The Heroes, Everything just seems REAL.

-Build Your Empire
Absolute Freedom in Empire Building, upgrade your facilities, research your technologies, train your troops and recruit powerful heroes to strengthen your empire!

Facebook Page:
https://www.facebook.com/RiseOfEmpireGame

NOTE: Rise of Empires is free to download and free to play, but does offer in-app purchases of items and other gifts. In-app purchases can be disabled through your device’s settings.
descriptionShort: It's the age of war. Build your own empire with strategy and conquer the world!

descriptionHtml:
ALL WORLDWIDE EMPIRES IN ONE SERVER

Real-Time Nation vs. Nation medieval strategy war game. Join now! Train your troops, gather your allies and go to war!

Rise of Empires is a Massive Multi-Player, Real-Time strategy war game. The player will take on the role of a leader in a small town devastated by the invasion of the Eastern Dynasty and the mysterious appearance of the legendary Death Harbingers who now have corrupted and had full control of the ancient powers of the dragons. Build your empire once again from the ruins, train your troops, tame dragons, recruit legendary heroes and join your allies in the non-ending war. To befriend or to plunder, the choice is yours!

FEATURES

-World Wide War
Real-time combat against players across the world, use your wisdom and strategy, lead your empire to greatness.

-Strategic Gameplay
One set of units just simply cannot dominate, Footmen, Cavalries, and Archers, you have to know your enemy and yourself to walk the battlefield of this world.

-Powerful Dragons
Powerful dragons each with different unique shouts are at your disposal, summon the dragons and crush your enemies with their help!

-Hero System
Whether you like to engage your enemies at a distance, take them on at close quarters, or you enjoy developing your base at home, there are TONS of heroes that can help you with just that!

-Alliance Warfare
No matter it’s going against different servers or fighting for the title of the king at home, your alliance will always be backing you up, as long as you find the right people of course.

-Realistic Graphics
Gorgeous medieval-style designs and arts. The Map, The World, Your Empire, The Units, The Heroes, Everything just seems REAL.

-Build Your Empire
Absolute Freedom in Empire Building, upgrade your facilities, research your technologies, train your troops and recruit powerful heroes to strengthen your empire!

Facebook Page:
https://www.facebook.com/RiseOfEmpireGame

NOTE: Rise of Empires is free to download and free to play, but does offer in-app purchases of items and other gifts. In-app purchases can be disabled through your device’s settings.

creator: Long Tech Network Limited
descriptionHtml:
ALL WORLDWIDE EMPIRES IN ONE SERVER

Real-Time Nation vs. Nation medieval strategy war game. Join now! Train your troops, gather your allies and go to war!

Rise of Empires is a Massive Multi-Player, Real-Time strategy war game. The player will take on the role of a leader in a small town devastated by the invasion of the Eastern Dynasty and the mysterious appearance of the legendary Death Harbingers who now have corrupted and had full control of the ancient powers of the dragons. Build your empire once again from the ruins, train your troops, tame dragons, recruit legendary heroes and join your allies in the non-ending war. To befriend or to plunder, the choice is yours!

FEATURES

-World Wide War
Real-time combat against players across the world, use your wisdom and strategy, lead your empire to greatness.

-Strategic Gameplay
One set of units just simply cannot dominate, Footmen, Cavalries, and Archers, you have to know your enemy and yourself to walk the battlefield of this world.

-Powerful Dragons
Powerful dragons each with different unique shouts are at your disposal, summon the dragons and crush your enemies with their help!

-Hero System
Whether you like to engage your enemies at a distance, take them on at close quarters, or you enjoy developing your base at home, there are TONS of heroes that can help you with just that!

-Alliance Warfare
No matter it’s going against different servers or fighting for the title of the king at home, your alliance will always be backing you up, as long as you find the right people of course.

-Realistic Graphics
Gorgeous medieval-style designs and arts. The Map, The World, Your Empire, The Units, The Heroes, Everything just seems REAL.

-Build Your Empire
Absolute Freedom in Empire Building, upgrade your facilities, research your technologies, train your troops and recruit powerful heroes to strengthen your empire!

Facebook Page:
https://www.facebook.com/RiseOfEmpireGame

NOTE: Rise of Empires is free to download and free to play, but does offer in-app purchases of items and other gifts. In-app purchases can be disabled through your device’s settings.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Optimizations
Reign of Chaos
1. Honor acquisition effects have been optimized to reduce visual clutter.

Castle Construction

title: Rise of Empires: Ice and Fire

container.value:
RM C 21/F CENTRAL 88, 88 DES
VOEUX RD CENTRAL
HONG KONG

creator: Long Tech Network Limited
descriptionHtml:
ALL WORLDWIDE EMPIRES IN ONE SERVER

Real-Time Nation vs. Nation medieval strategy war game. Join now! Train your troops, gather your allies and go to war!

Rise of Empires is a Massive Multi-Player, Real-Time strategy war game. The player will take on the role of a leader in a small town devastated by the invasion of the Eastern Dynasty and the mysterious appearance of the legendary Death Harbingers who now have corrupted and had full control of the ancient powers of the dragons. Build your empire once again from the ruins, train your troops, tame dragons, recruit legendary heroes and join your allies in the non-ending war. To befriend or to plunder, the choice is yours!

FEATURES

-World Wide War
Real-time combat against players across the world, use your wisdom and strategy, lead your empire to greatness.

-Strategic Gameplay
One set of units just simply cannot dominate, Footmen, Cavalries, and Archers, you have to know your enemy and yourself to walk the battlefield of this world.

-Powerful Dragons
Powerful dragons each with different unique shouts are at your disposal, summon the dragons and crush your enemies with their help!

-Hero System
Whether you like to engage your enemies at a distance, take them on at close quarters, or you enjoy developing your base at home, there are TONS of heroes that can help you with just that!

-Alliance Warfare
No matter it’s going against different servers or fighting for the title of the king at home, your alliance will always be backing you up, as long as you find the right people of course.

-Realistic Graphics
Gorgeous medieval-style designs and arts. The Map, The World, Your Empire, The Units, The Heroes, Everything just seems REAL.

-Build Your Empire
Absolute Freedom in Empire Building, upgrade your facilities, research your technologies, train your troops and recruit powerful heroes to strengthen your empire!

Facebook Page:
https://www.facebook.com/RiseOfEmpireGame

NOTE: Rise of Empires is free to download and free to play, but does offer in-app purchases of items and other gifts. In-app purchases can be disabled through your device’s settings.
descriptionShort: It's the age of war. Build your own empire with strategy and conquer the world!

appDetails.developerAddress:
RM C 21/F CENTRAL 88, 88 DES
VOEUX RD CENTRAL
HONG KONG
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Version 1.250.195 Out Now

New Features

Season Event Start

Through the constant efforts of the dragons, a magical portal connecting this world to that of an ancient world has been discovered underneath the throne.

Through the portal, my Lord will be able to experience a brand new seasonal event

The portal will be open in the newest version. Please update to 1.250.195 or above to open the portal and begin exploring!

Build your empire once again from the ruins, train your troops, tame dragons, recruit legendary heroes and join your allies in the non-ending war. To befriend or to plunder, the choice is yours!

FEATURES

-World Wide War
Real-time combat against players across the world, use your wisdom and strategy, lead your empire to greatness.

-Strategic Gameplay
One set of units just simply cannot dominate, Footmen, Cavalries, and Archers, you have to know your enemy and yourself to walk the battlefield of this world.

-Powerful Dragons
Powerful dragons each with different unique shouts are at your disposal, summon the dragons and crush your enemies with their help!

-Hero System
Whether you like to engage your enemies at a distance, take them on at close quarters, or you enjoy developing your base at home, there are TONS of heroes that can help you with just that!

-Alliance Warfare
No matter it’s going against different servers or fighting for the title of the king at home, your alliance will always be backing you up, as long as you find the right people of course.

-Realistic Graphics
Gorgeous medieval-style designs and arts. The Map, The World, Your Empire, The Units, The Heroes, Everything just seems REAL.

-Build Your Empire
Absolute Freedom in Empire Building, upgrade your facilities, research your technologies, train your troops and recruit powerful heroes to strengthen your empire!

Facebook Page:
https://www.facebook.com/RiseOfEmpireGame

NOTE: Rise of Empires is free to download and free to play, but does offer in-app purchases of items and other gifts. In-app purchases can be disabled through your device’s settings.
descriptionShort: It's the age of war. Build your own empire with strategy and conquer the world!

Rise of Empires is a Massive Multi-Player, Real-Time strategy war game. The player will take on the role of a leader in a small town devastated by the invasion of the Eastern Dynasty and the mysterious appearance of the legendary Death Harbingers who now have corrupted and had full control of the ancient powers of the dragons. Build your empire once again from the ruins, train your troops, tame dragons, recruit legendary heroes and join your allies in the non-ending war. To befriend or to plunder, the choice is yours!

FEATURES

-World Wide War
Real-time combat against players across the world, use your wisdom and strategy, lead your empire to greatness.

-Strategic Gameplay
One set of units just simply cannot dominate, Footmen, Cavalries, and Archers, you have to know your enemy and yourself to walk the battlefield of this world.

-Powerful Dragons
Powerful dragons each with different unique shouts are at your disposal, summon the dragons and crush your enemies with their help!

-Hero System
Whether you like to engage your enemies at a distance, take them on at close quarters, or you enjoy developing your base at home, there are TONS of heroes that can help you with just that!

-Alliance Warfare
No matter it’s going against different servers or fighting for the title of the king at home, your alliance will always be backing you up, as long as you find the right people of course.

-Realistic Graphics
Gorgeous medieval-style designs and arts. The Map, The World, Your Empire, The Units, The Heroes, Everything just seems REAL.

-Build Your Empire
Absolute Freedom in Empire Building, upgrade your facilities, research your technologies, train your troops and recruit powerful heroes to strengthen your empire!

Facebook Page:
https://www.facebook.com/RiseOfEmpireGame

NOTE: Rise of Empires is free to download and free to play, but does offer in-app purchases of items and other gifts. In-app purchases can be disabled through your device’s settings.
descriptionShort: It's the age of war. Build your own empire with strategy and conquer the world!

One set of units just simply cannot dominate, Footmen, Cavalries, and Archers, you have to know your enemy and yourself to walk the battlefield of this world.

-Powerful Dragons
Powerful dragons each with different unique shouts are at your disposal, summon the dragons and crush your enemies with their help!

-Hero System
Whether you like to engage your enemies at a distance, take them on at close quarters, or you enjoy developing your base at home, there are TONS of heroes that can help you with just that!

No matter it’s going against different servers or fighting for the title of the king at home, your alliance will always be backing you up, as long as you find the right people of course.

-Realistic Graphics
Gorgeous medieval-style designs and arts. The Map, The World, Your Empire, The Units, The Heroes, Everything just seems REAL.

-Build Your Empire
Absolute Freedom in Empire Building, upgrade your facilities, research your technologies, train your troops and recruit powerful heroes to strengthen your empire!

descriptionHtml:
ALL WORLDWIDE EMPIRES IN ONE SERVER

Real-Time Nation vs. Nation medieval strategy war game. Join now! Train your troops, gather your allies and go to war!

Rise of Empires is a Massive Multi-Player, Real-Time strategy war game. The player will take on the role of a leader in a small town devastated by the invasion of the Eastern Dynasty and the mysterious appearance of the legendary Death Harbingers who now have corrupted and had full control of the ancient powers of the dragons. Build your empire once again from the ruins, train your troops, tame dragons, recruit legendary heroes and join your allies in the non-ending war. To befriend or to plunder, the choice is yours!

FEATURES

-World Wide War
Real-time combat against players across the world, use your wisdom and strategy, lead your empire to greatness.

-Strategic Gameplay
One set of units just simply cannot dominate, Footmen, Cavalries, and Archers, you have to know your enemy and yourself to walk the battlefield of this world.

-Powerful Dragons
Powerful dragons each with different unique shouts are at your disposal, summon the dragons and crush your enemies with their help!

-Hero System
Whether you like to engage your enemies at a distance, take them on at close quarters, or you enjoy developing your base at home, there are TONS of heroes that can help you with just that!

-Alliance Warfare
No matter it’s going against different servers or fighting for the title of the king at home, your alliance will always be backing you up, as long as you find the right people of course.

-Realistic Graphics
Gorgeous medieval-style designs and arts. The Map, The World, Your Empire, The Units, The Heroes, Everything just seems REAL.

-Build Your Empire

The player will take on the role of a leader in a small town devastated by the invasion of the Eastern Dynasty and the mysterious appearance of the legendary Death Harbingers who now have corrupted and had full control of the ancient powers of the dragons. Build your empire once again from the ruins, train your troops, tame dragons, recruit legendary heroes and join your allies in the non-ending war. To befriend or to plunder, the choice is yours!

FEATURES

-World Wide War
Real-time combat against players across the world, use your wisdom and strategy, lead your empire to greatness.

-Strategic Gameplay
One set of units just simply cannot dominate, Footmen, Cavalries, and Archers, you have to know your enemy and yourself to walk the battlefield of this world.

-Powerful Dragons
Powerful dragons each with different unique shouts are at your disposal, summon the dragons and crush your enemies with their help!

-Hero System
Whether you like to engage your enemies at a distance, take them on at close quarters, or you enjoy developing your base at home, there are TONS of heroes that can help you with just that!

-Alliance Warfare
No matter it’s going against different servers or fighting for the title of the king at home, your alliance will always be backing you up, as long as you find the right people of course.

-Realistic Graphics
Gorgeous medieval-style designs and arts. The Map, The World, Your Empire, The Units, The Heroes, Everything just seems REAL.

-Build Your Empire
Absolute Freedom in Empire Building, upgrade your facilities, research your technologies, train your troops and recruit powerful heroes to strengthen your empire!

Facebook Page:
https://www.facebook.com/RiseOfEmpireGame

NOTE: Rise of Empires is free to download and free to play, but does offer in-app purchases of items and other gifts. In-app purchases can be disabled through your device’s settings.
descriptionShort: It's the age of war. Build your own empire with strategy and conquer the world!

appDetails.developerAddress: Level 16, Lee Garden Two, 28 Yun Ping Road, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Version 1.250.232 Out Now

New Features

New emotes available for chats.

Soldier training is now added to the missions on Saturday of the Clash of Provinces.

Optimizations

Optimized the auto-translation feature, ensuring that the texts with special symbols can be translated more accurately.

Optimized the Heroes Duel. You may sign up for the event or change your formation while in another Province.

Improved the graphics of the rivers on the map.

Build your empire once again from the ruins, train your troops, tame dragons, recruit legendary heroes and join your allies in the non-ending war. To befriend or to plunder, the choice is yours!

FEATURES

-World Wide War
Real-time combat against players across the world, use your wisdom and strategy, lead your empire to greatness.

-Strategic Gameplay
One set of units just simply cannot dominate, Footmen, Cavalries, and Archers, you have to know your enemy and yourself to walk the battlefield of this world.

-Powerful Dragons
Powerful dragons each with different unique shouts are at your disposal, summon the dragons and crush your enemies with their help!

-Hero System
Whether you like to engage your enemies at a distance, take them on at close quarters, or you enjoy developing your base at home, there are TONS of heroes that can help you with just that!

-Alliance Warfare
No matter it’s going against different servers or fighting for the title of the king at home, your alliance will always be backing you up, as long as you find the right people of course.

-Realistic Graphics
Gorgeous medieval-style designs and arts. The Map, The World, Your Empire, The Units, The Heroes, Everything just seems REAL.

-Build Your Empire
Absolute Freedom in Empire Building, upgrade your facilities, research your technologies, train your troops and recruit powerful heroes to strengthen your empire!

Facebook Page:
https://www.facebook.com/RiseOfEmpireGame

NOTE: Rise of Empires is free to download and free to play, but does offer in-app purchases of items and other gifts. In-app purchases can be disabled through your device’s settings.
descriptionShort: It's the age of war. Build your own empire with strategy and conquer the world!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

A switch for the day/night shift is added to the settings.

Optimizations

appDetails.developerAddress: Level 16, Lee Garden Two, 28 Yun Ping Road, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Version 1.250.242 Out Now

Optimizations

Optimized the display of marching queues. Now you can see the number of soldiers staying at a place and the gathering progress.

Optimized the experience in the Battlefield of Honor. Removed some disturbing visual effects.

Optimized the experience for Lords who join in the middle of the four-empire mode. Lords can now join a Faction with their Alliances.

Fixes

Optimized the display issue with the building info in the four-empire mode.

appDetails.developerAddress: Level 16, Lee Garden Two, 28 Yun Ping Road, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Version 1.250.244 Out Now

New Features

New feature in the VIP Shop: Quick Recovery of Castle Durability. Activate it to restore your Castle's Durability more conveniently.

Optimizations

Optimized the resource transport feature, allowing resources to be transported while the buildings are being upgraded.

Fixes

Fixed the issue where players could not obtain any Hourly Challenge points by speeding up the construction of Honor Structures in Eden.

New Frost Fortress event: Join your allies to attack the Frost Fortress!

title: Rise of Empires: Ice and Fire

container.value: Level 16, Lee Garden Two, 28 Yun Ping Road, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong

creator: Long Tech Network Limited
descriptionHtml:
ALL WORLDWIDE EMPIRES IN ONE SERVER

Real-Time Nation vs. Nation medieval strategy war game. Join now! Train your troops, gather your allies and go to war!

Rise of Empires is a Massive Multi-Player, Real-Time strategy war game. The player will take on the role of a leader in a small town devastated by the invasion of the Eastern Dynasty and the mysterious appearance of the legendary Death Harbingers who now have corrupted and had full control of the ancient powers of the dragons. Build your empire once again from the ruins, train your troops, tame dragons, recruit legendary heroes and join your allies in the non-ending war. To befriend or to plunder, the choice is yours!

FEATURES

-World Wide War
Real-time combat against players across the world, use your wisdom and strategy, lead your empire to greatness.

-Strategic Gameplay
One set of units just simply cannot dominate, Footmen, Cavalries, and Archers, you have to know your enemy and yourself to walk the battlefield of this world.

-Powerful Dragons
Powerful dragons each with different unique shouts are at your disposal, summon the dragons and crush your enemies with their help!

-Hero System
Whether you like to engage your enemies at a distance, take them on at close quarters, or you enjoy developing your base at home, there are TONS of heroes that can help you with just that!

-Alliance Warfare
No matter it’s going against different servers or fighting for the title of the king at home, your alliance will always be backing you up, as long as you find the right people of course.

-Realistic Graphics
Gorgeous medieval-style designs and arts. The Map, The World, Your Empire, The Units, The Heroes, Everything just seems REAL.

-Build Your Empire
Absolute Freedom in Empire Building, upgrade your facilities, research your technologies, train your troops and recruit powerful heroes to strengthen your empire!

Facebook Page:
https://www.facebook.com/ROE.RiseOfEmpires

NOTE: Rise of Empires is free to download and free to play, but does offer in-app purchases of items and other gifts. In-app purchases can be disabled through your device’s settings.

title: Rise of Empires: Ice and Fire

container.value: Level 16, Lee Garden Two, 28 Yun Ping Road, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong

creator: Long Tech Network Limited
descriptionHtml:
ALL WORLDWIDE EMPIRES IN ONE SERVER

Real-Time Nation vs. Nation medieval strategy war game. Join now! Train your troops, gather your allies and go to war!

Rise of Empires is a Massive Multi-Player, Real-Time strategy war game. The player will take on the role of a leader in a small town devastated by the invasion of the Eastern Dynasty and the mysterious appearance of the legendary Death Harbingers who now have corrupted and had full control of the ancient powers of the dragons. Build your empire once again from the ruins, train your troops, tame dragons, recruit legendary heroes and join your allies in the non-ending war. To befriend or to plunder, the choice is yours!

FEATURES

-World Wide War
Real-time combat against players across the world, use your wisdom and strategy, lead your empire to greatness.

-Strategic Gameplay
One set of units just simply cannot dominate, Footmen, Cavalries, and Archers, you have to know your enemy and yourself to walk the battlefield of this world.

-Powerful Dragons
Powerful dragons each with different unique shouts are at your disposal, summon the dragons and crush your enemies with their help!

-Hero System
Whether you like to engage your enemies at a distance, take them on at close quarters, or you enjoy developing your base at home, there are TONS of heroes that can help you with just that!

-Alliance Warfare
No matter it’s going against different servers or fighting for the title of the king at home, your alliance will always be backing you up, as long as you find the right people of course.

-Realistic Graphics
Gorgeous medieval-style designs and arts. The Map, The World, Your Empire, The Units, The Heroes, Everything just seems REAL.

-Build Your Empire
Absolute Freedom in Empire Building, upgrade your facilities, research your technologies, train your troops and recruit powerful heroes to strengthen your empire!

https://www.facebook.com/ROE.RiseOfEmpires

title: Rise of Empires: Ice and Fire

container.value: Level 16, Lee Garden Two, 28 Yun Ping Road, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong

creator: Long Tech Network Limited
descriptionHtml:
ALL WORLDWIDE EMPIRES IN ONE SERVER

Real-Time Nation vs. Nation medieval strategy war game. Join now! Train your troops, gather your allies and go to war!

Rise of Empires is a Massive Multi-Player, Real-Time strategy war game. The player will take on the role of a leader in a small town devastated by the invasion of the Eastern Dynasty and the mysterious appearance of the legendary Death Harbingers who now have corrupted and had full control of the ancient powers of the dragons. Build your empire once again from the ruins, train your troops, tame dragons, recruit legendary heroes and join your allies in the non-ending war. To befriend or to plunder, the choice is yours!

FEATURES

-World Wide War
Real-time combat against players across the world, use your wisdom and strategy, lead your empire to greatness.

-Strategic Gameplay
One set of units just simply cannot dominate, Footmen, Cavalries, and Archers, you have to know your enemy and yourself to walk the battlefield of this world.

-Powerful Dragons
Powerful dragons each with different unique shouts are at your disposal, summon the dragons and crush your enemies with their help!

-Hero System
Whether you like to engage your enemies at a distance, take them on at close quarters, or you enjoy developing your base at home, there are TONS of heroes that can help you with just that!

-Alliance Warfare
No matter it’s going against different servers or fighting for the title of the king at home, your alliance will always be backing you up, as long as you find the right people of course.

-Realistic Graphics
Gorgeous medieval-style designs and arts. The Map, The World, Your Empire, The Units, The Heroes, Everything just seems REAL.

-Build Your Empire
Absolute Freedom in Empire Building, upgrade your facilities, research your technologies, train your troops and recruit powerful heroes to strengthen your empire!

Facebook Page:
https://www.facebook.com/ROE.RiseOfEmpires

NOTE: Rise of Empires is free to download and free to play, but does offer in-app purchases of items and other gifts. In-app purchases can be disabled through your device’s settings.
descriptionShort: It's the age of war. Build your own empire with strategy and conquer the world!

appDetails.developerAddress: Level 16, Lee Garden Two, 28 Yun Ping Road, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Version 2.1.0 Out Now

The Battlefield of Honor: All-Star Championship kicks off.

The unlocking condition of the Imperial Guards has been optimized. The required level for unlocking relevant techs/buildings now becomes Lv. 28 (Castle), instead of Lv. 30. To activate T10's skills, however, you still need to reach Lv. 30 and study the required techs.

Optimized the S3 tech [Guard Rally], after studying which there will be no more limit on the number of T10 soldiers you can hold.

Rise of Empires is a Massive Multi-Player, Real-Time strategy war game. The player will take on the role of a leader in a small town devastated by the invasion of the Eastern Dynasty and the mysterious appearance of the legendary Death Harbingers who now have corrupted and had full control of the ancient powers of the dragons. Build your empire once again from the ruins, train your troops, tame dragons, recruit legendary heroes and join your allies in the non-ending war. To befriend or to plunder, the choice is yours!

FEATURES

-World Wide War
Real-time combat against players across the world, use your wisdom and strategy, lead your empire to greatness.

-Strategic Gameplay
One set of units just simply cannot dominate, Footmen, Cavalries, and Archers, you have to know your enemy and yourself to walk the battlefield of this world.

-Powerful Dragons
Powerful dragons each with different unique shouts are at your disposal, summon the dragons and crush your enemies with their help!

-Hero System
Whether you like to engage your enemies at a distance, take them on at close quarters, or you enjoy developing your base at home, there are TONS of heroes that can help you with just that!

-Alliance Warfare
No matter it’s going against different servers or fighting for the title of the king at home, your alliance will always be backing you up, as long as you find the right people of course.

-Realistic Graphics
Gorgeous medieval-style designs and arts. The Map, The World, Your Empire, The Units, The Heroes, Everything just seems REAL.

-Build Your Empire
Absolute Freedom in Empire Building, upgrade your facilities, research your technologies, train your troops and recruit powerful heroes to strengthen your empire!

Facebook Page:
https://www.facebook.com/ROE.RiseOfEmpires

NOTE: Rise of Empires is free to download and free to play, but does offer in-app purchases of items and other gifts. In-app purchases can be disabled through your device’s settings.
descriptionShort: It's the age of war. Build your own empire with strategy and conquer the world!

Build your empire once again from the ruins, train your troops, tame dragons, recruit legendary heroes and join your allies in the non-ending war. To befriend or to plunder, the choice is yours!

FEATURES

-World Wide War
Real-time combat against players across the world, use your wisdom and strategy, lead your empire to greatness.

-Strategic Gameplay
One set of units just simply cannot dominate, Footmen, Cavalries, and Archers, you have to know your enemy and yourself to walk the battlefield of this world.

-Powerful Dragons
Powerful dragons each with different unique shouts are at your disposal, summon the dragons and crush your enemies with their help!

-Hero System
Whether you like to engage your enemies at a distance, take them on at close quarters, or you enjoy developing your base at home, there are TONS of heroes that can help you with just that!

-Alliance Warfare
No matter it’s going against different servers or fighting for the title of the king at home, your alliance will always be backing you up, as long as you find the right people of course.

-Realistic Graphics
Gorgeous medieval-style designs and arts. The Map, The World, Your Empire, The Units, The Heroes, Everything just seems REAL.

-Build Your Empire
Absolute Freedom in Empire Building, upgrade your facilities, research your technologies, train your troops and recruit powerful heroes to strengthen your empire!

Facebook Page:
https://www.facebook.com/ROE.RiseOfEmpires

NOTE: Rise of Empires is free to download and free to play, but does offer in-app purchases of items and other gifts. In-app purchases can be disabled through your device’s settings.
descriptionShort: It's the age of war. Build your own empire with strategy and conquer the world!

The empire is about to welcome a new renowned hero: Alexandria!

A new quest system will soon be introduced, and by meeting quest requirements, you can earn loads of rewards for upgrading your dragon.

title:
Rise of Castles: Ice and Fire
2.17.3

container.value: Level 16, Lee Garden Two, 28 Yun Ping Road, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong

creator: Long Tech Network Limited
descriptionHtml:
One World, One Server

Real Time Nation vs. Nation medieval strategy war game. Join now! Train your troops and go to war!

Rise of Castles is a Massive Multi-Player, Real-Time strategy war game. The player will take on the role of a leader in a small town devastated by the invasion of the Eastern Dynasty and the mysterious appearance of the legendary Death Harbingers who now has corrupted and have full control of the ancient powers of the dragons. Build your castle once again from the ruins, train your troops, tame dragons, recruit legendary heroes and join your allies in the non-ending war. To befriend or to plunder, the choice is yours!

Unique Features

-World Wide War
Real-time combat against players across the world, lead your country to greatness

-Strategic Gameplay
One set of units just simply cannot dominate, Footmen, Cavalries and Archers, You have to know your enemy and yourself to walk the battlefield of this world.

-Powerful Dragons
Powerful dragons each with different unique shouts are at your disposal, crush your enemies with their help!

-Hero System
Whether you like to engage your enemies at a distance, take them on at close quarters, or you enjoy developing your base at home, there are TONS of heroes that can help you with just that!

-Alliance Warfare
Whether it’s going against different servers, or fighting for the title of the president at home, your alliance will always be backing you up, as long as you find the right people of course.

-Realistic Graphics
The Map, The World, Your City, The Units, The Heroes, Everything just seems, REAL

-Build Your Castle
Absolute Freedom in City Building, upgrade your facilities, research your technologies, train your troops and recruit powerful heroes to strengthen your castle!

NOTE: Rise of Castles is free to download and free to play, but does offer in-app purchases of items and other gifts. In-app purchases can be disabled through your device’s settings.
descriptionShort: Build your own castle with strategy and conquer the world!

title:
Rise of Castles: Ice and Fire
2.22.0

container.value: Level 16, Lee Garden Two, 28 Yun Ping Road, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong

creator: Long Tech Network Limited
descriptionHtml:
In Rise of Castles , you will embark on a legendary medieval journey and become a great lord, running your spectacular castle! Build your kingdom and conquer other players' territory to show your ruling power!

【Customize Your Castle】
Now use your wits to farm and forage, and place various buildings, walls, and rivers smartly! Leverage the resources and workers you've got for faster upgrades! From a small fort to an unbeatable Avalon, develop your kingdom into a new center of civilization.

【Explore & Forage】
Behold! What you see is a world full of mysteries and opportunities! Command your army to explore the vast territory with strategy! Exterminate monsters, collect resources, and unearth treasures in this rewarding journey!

【Create Your Alliance】
Forge an alliance with other Lords to fight off your common enemy and secure victory! Venture into the unknown world to expand your territory, discover new resources, and swell your kingdom treasury!

【World-Wide War】
Summon renowned medieval generals to fight for you! Build an invincible army with various units and rock the battlefield! Defend your stronghold and compete with top players worldwide to snatch more resources and lands and fight for domination!

Join now to create your medieval legend and be the Lord of Glory! Experience the thrill of medieval real-time strategy at any time!
descriptionShort: Build Your Castle and Conquer the World with Your Strategy!

title:
Rise of Castles: Ice and Fire
2.24.1

container.value: Level 16, Lee Garden Two, 28 Yun Ping Road, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong

creator: Long Tech Network Limited
descriptionHtml:
In Rise of Castles , you will embark on a legendary medieval journey and become a great lord, running your spectacular castle! Build your kingdom and conquer other players' territory to show your ruling power!

【Customize Your Castle】
Now use your wits to farm and forage, and place various buildings, walls, and rivers smartly! Leverage the resources and workers you've got for faster upgrades! From a small fort to an unbeatable Avalon, develop your kingdom into a new center of civilization.

【Explore & Forage】
Behold! What you see is a world full of mysteries and opportunities! Command your army to explore the vast territory with strategy! Exterminate monsters, collect resources, and unearth treasures in this rewarding journey!

【Create Your Alliance】
Forge an alliance with other Lords to fight off your common enemy and secure victory! Venture into the unknown world to expand your territory, discover new resources, and swell your kingdom treasury!

【World-Wide War】
Summon renowned medieval generals to fight for you! Build an invincible army with various units and rock the battlefield! Defend your stronghold and compete with top players worldwide to snatch more resources and lands and fight for domination!

Join now to create your medieval legend and be the Lord of Glory! Experience the thrill of medieval real-time strategy at any time!
descriptionShort: Build Your Castle and Conquer the World with Your Strategy!

In Rise of Castles , you will embark on a legendary medieval journey and become a great lord, running your spectacular castle! Build your kingdom and conquer other players' territory to show your ruling power!

【Customize Your Castle】
Now use your wits to farm and forage, and place various buildings, walls, and rivers smartly! Leverage the resources and workers you've got for faster upgrades! From a small fort to an unbeatable Avalon, develop your kingdom into a new center of civilization.

【Explore & Forage】
Behold! What you see is a world full of mysteries and opportunities! Command your army to explore the vast territory with strategy! Exterminate monsters, collect resources, and unearth treasures in this rewarding journey!

【Create Your Alliance】
Forge an alliance with other Lords to fight off your common enemy and secure victory! Venture into the unknown world to expand your territory, discover new resources, and swell your kingdom treasury!

【World-Wide War】
Summon renowned medieval generals to fight for you! Build an invincible army with various units and rock the battlefield! Defend your stronghold and compete with top players worldwide to snatch more resources and lands and fight for domination!

Join now to create your medieval legend and be the Lord of Glory! Experience the thrill of medieval real-time strategy at any time!
descriptionShort: Build Your Castle and Conquer the World with Your Strategy!

container.value: Level 16, Lee Garden Two, 28 Yun Ping Road, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong

creator: Long Tech Network Limited
descriptionHtml:
In Rise of Castles , you will embark on a legendary medieval journey and become a great lord, running your spectacular castle! Build your kingdom and conquer other players' territory to show your ruling power!

【Customize Your Castle】
Now use your wits to farm and forage, and place various buildings, walls, and rivers smartly! Leverage the resources and workers you've got for faster upgrades! From a small fort to an unbeatable Avalon, develop your kingdom into a new center of civilization.

【Explore & Forage】
Behold! What you see is a world full of mysteries and opportunities! Command your army to explore the vast territory with strategy! Exterminate monsters, collect resources, and unearth treasures in this rewarding journey!

【Create Your Alliance】
Forge an alliance with other Lords to fight off your common enemy and secure victory! Venture into the unknown world to expand your territory, discover new resources, and swell your kingdom treasury!

【World-Wide War】
Summon renowned medieval generals to fight for you! Build an invincible army with various units and rock the battlefield! Defend your stronghold and compete with top players worldwide to snatch more resources and lands and fight for domination!

Join now to create your medieval legend and be the Lord of Glory! Experience the thrill of medieval real-time strategy at any time!
descriptionShort: Build Your Castle and Conquer the World with Your Strategy!

- Optimized the navigation for accepting tasks and claiming rewards in The White Crow.

- New guild announcement feature.

Poll results will be sent to guild members' mailboxes.
